downloadTitle: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 Management Pack for System Center
downloadDescription: The Host Integration Server 2016 management pack for System Center Operations Manager provides monitoring of Host Integration Server 2016

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 MP Guide.doc
Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 MP for System Center.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/f/2/8f2d9534-021f-4cea-ba39-c41af48948e0/Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 MP for System Center.msi

detailsSection:
The Host Integration Server 2016 management pack provides the capabilities for Operations Manager to discover and monitor the availability of Host Integration Server 2016 server components and applications.



Feature Summary
The following list gives an overview of the features introduced by Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Management Pack for Host Integration Server 2016. Please refer to Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 Management Pack Guide for more details.
  • Support for Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2016
  • Discovery and monitoring for SNA Gateway Servers
  • Discovery and monitoring for Microsoft Service for DRDA
  • Discovery and monitoring for Transaction Integrator HIP and WIP applications
  • Discovery and monitoring MQChannel WAS listener

    • Release History
  • 4/6/2017 - Original release of the English version, version 10.0.2306.0
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 MP Guide.doc
Microsoft Host Integration Server 2016 MP for System Center.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
You have one of the following versions of System Center Operations Manager deployed:
  • System Center Operations Manager 2012
  • System Center Operations Manager 2016
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
